name: Maria Hill
text: Each ally you control gains the [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] trait. Reassignment — Action: Move 1 all-purpose counter from a [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] support to another [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] support. (Limit once per round.)

name: Maria Hill
text: You may include the maximum number of copies of 3 [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] supports in your deck from aspects other than your chosen aspect. Action: Exhaust Maria Hill → search your deck for a [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] support and add it to your hand.

flavor: "I put my best agent on the case." —Maria Hill
name: Nick Fury
text: [star] Response: After Nick Fury uses a basic power, place 1 all-purpose counter on a [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] support.

name: All-Points Bulletin
text: Hero Action: For each [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] support you control, choose: • Remove 1 threat from a scheme. • Deal 1 damage to an enemy.

flavor: "I want the suspect in custody yesterday!" —Maria Hill
name: On the Double
text: Action: Ready any number of [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] supports with a combined printed cost of 6 or less.

flavor: "We got orders straight from the Director. Move it!" —Dum Dum Dugan
name: Reinforcements
text: Action: Choose any number of [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] supports with a combined printed cost of 6 or less. Place 1 all-purpose counter on each of those supports.

flavor: "Sometimes it just comes down to numbers. More people die if I don't act than if I do." —Maria Hill
name: The Hard Call
text: Hero Action: Discard a [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] support you control → deal X damage to each enemy, where X is the printed cost of the discarded support.

name: Special Funding
text: Response: After you spend this card to pay for a [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] support, place 1 all-purpose counter on that support after it enters play.

name: Support Staff
text: Uses (3 staff counters). Resource: Exhaust Support Staff and remove 1 staff counter from it → generate a [wild] resource for a player whose identity has the [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] trait.

name: The Iliad
text: Uses (3 mission counters). Action: Exhaust The Iliad and remove 1 mission counter from it → choose: • Deal 5 damage to an enemy. • Remove 4 threat from a scheme. • Heal 3 damage from an identity.

flavor: "When you've got job hazards like I do, it pays to take precautions." —Maria Hill
name: Life Model Decoy
text: Interrupt: When an enemy attacks you, discard Life Model Decoy → prevent all damage from that attack.

flavor: "You don't have to agree with my orders. You just have to carry them out." —Maria Hill
name: S.H.I.E.L.D. Director
text: Action: Exhaust S.H.I.E.L.D. Director → place 1 all-purpose counter on a [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] support.

flavor: "I better get hazard pay for this!"
name: Victoria Hand
text: Response: After Victoria Hand enters play, ready a [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] support.

name: Slingshot
text: Action: Spend a [energy] resource → put Slingshot into play from your hand under any player's control. At the end of the phase, if Slingshot is still in play, return her to your hand.

name: Organizational Support
text: Interrupt: When you spend this card, exhaust up to 3 allies and/or supports you control that share a [[Trait]] with your identity → generate the printed resources on each card exhausted this way.

name: Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D.
text: Play under any player's control. Max 1 [[Team]] card per player. If each of your characters has the [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] trait, this card gains: "Interrupt: When you reveal an encounter card, exhaust this card → cancel the effects of that card and discard it. Then, reveal another card from the encounter deck."

name: The Circe
text: Uses (2 deploy counters). Action: Exhaust The Circe, remove 1 deploy counter from it, and choose a player → that player puts an ally into play from their hand.

name: The Bellerophon
text: Uses (3 missile counters). Action: Exhaust The Bellerophon, remove 1 missile counter from it, and choose a player → deal 3 damage to the villain and each minion engaged with that player, discarding all tough status cards from those enemies first.

name: The Douglass
text: Uses (3 operation counters). Action: Exhaust The Douglass and remove 1 operational counter from it → remove 2 threat from each scheme, ignoring any crisis icons ([crisis]) in play.

name: The Pericles
text: Uses (2 supply counters). Action: Exhaust The Pericles and remove 1 supply counter from it → give a hero or villain a status card of your choice. Give an ally or minion a status card of your choice.

name: Grant Ward
text: Grant Ward cannot defend. Forced Response: After you reveal a treachery, you may spend a [mental] resource. If you do not, take damage equal to Grant Ward's ATK and remove Grant Ward from the game.

name: Melinda May
text: [star] Response: After Melinda May uses a basic power, look at the top card of the encounter deck. You may discard that card.

name: Super Spies
text: Team-Up (Maria Hill and Nick Fury). Max 1 per deck. Hero Action: Place a total of 3 all-purpose counters and/or threat tokens on [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] supports and/or suit form upgrades.

name: Front Organization
text: Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player. Interrupt: When an encounter card effect would discard a card you control, discard Front Organization instead of discarding that card.

name: Nick Fury
text: [star] Gather Intel — Response: After Nick Fury makes a basic thwart, place 1 threat on your suit form upgrade. Break Cover — Forced Interrupt: When you attack, change to Assault suit form.

name: Nick Fury
text: Suit Up — Setup: Put your suit form upgrade into play, Assault side faceup. Infiltrate — Action: Change to Stealth suit form.

name: Assault
text: Suit form. Permanent. Interrupt: When you attack, remove up to 3 threat from here → this attack deals 1 additional damage for each threat removed this way.

name: Stealth
text: Suit form. Permanent. Forced Interrupt (Hero): When an enemy would attack you, it schemes instead. Place 1 threat from that activation here instead of on the main scheme if there is 5 or less threat on this card.

flavor: "Now that's how you make an exit!"
name: Maria Hill
text: [star] Interrupt: When Maria Hill thwarts, place the removed threat on your suit form upgrade.

name: Concentrated Fire
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 4 damage to an enemy. This attack gains ranged. If this attack defeats an enemy, choose: • Place threat on your suit form upgrade equal to that enemy's printed SCH. • Change to Stealth suit form.

name: Covert Surveillance
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 2 threat from a scheme. If you are in Stealth suit form, you may place that threat on your suit form upgrade. Otherwise, you may change to Stealth suit form.

name: Spray Fire
text: Hero Action (attack): Choose a player. Deal 3 damage to the villain and each minion engaged with that player. This attack gains ranged.

name: Fury's Flying Car
text: Hero Action: Exhaust Fury's Flying Car and remove 1 threat from your suit form upgrade → ready Nick Fury. He gains the [[Aerial]] trait until the end of the round.

name: Safe House #221
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Safe House #221 → choose: • Heal 2 damage from Nick Fury. • Place 1 threat on your suit form upgrade.

name: EM Shield
text: Interrupt (defense): When you would take any amount of damage from an attack, discard EM Shield → prevent all of that damage.

name: Eyepatch Camera
text: Hero Interrupt: When any amount of threat would be placed on the main scheme, discard Eyepatch Camera → place up to 3 of that threat on your suit form upgrade instead.

name: Fury's Watch
text: Resource: Exhaust Fury's Watch and remove up to 2 threat from your suit form upgrade → generate a [mental] resource for each threat you removed this way.

name: Intelligence Analysis
text: Interrupt: When you reveal a treachery, discard Intelligence Analysis and remove 1 threat from your suit form upgrade → cancel the effects of that treachery and discard it.

flavor: "I'm a man who leads a life of danger." —Nick Fury
name: Secret Agent
text: Hero Response: After you resolve the ability of a [[Preparation]] card you control, move 1 threat from a scheme to your suit form upgrade.

flavor: "What's that information worth to you, Coulson?" —Taskmaster
name: Informant
text: Max 1 per player. Interrupt: When a minion schemes, discard Informant → this activation removes threat instead of placing it.

name: Intelligence
text: Max 1 per player. Response: After a player is dealt an encounter card, discard Intelligence → look at each encounter card dealt to each player and the top card of the encounter deck. You may swap any number of those cards.

name: Prism Dust
text: Max 1 per player. Hero Response (attack): After a minion enters play, discard Prism Dust → confuse that minion and deal 2 damage to it.

name: Nick Fury, Sr.
text: Forced Response: After Nick Fury, Sr. enters play, choose one: Remove 3 threat from a scheme, draw 2 cards, or give a [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] character a tough status card. At the end of the round, if Nick Fury, Sr. is still in play, discard him.

name: Jemma Simmons
text: Reduce the cost to play Jemma Simmons by 2 if your identity has the [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] trait. Resource: Exhaust Jemma Simmons → generate a [mental] resource for a [[Tech]] card.

name: Leo Fitz
text: Reduce the cost to play Leo Fitz by 2 if your identity has the [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] trait. Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Leo Fitz → search you deck for a [[Tech]] card and add it to your hand. (Shuffle.)

name: Practiced Plan
text: Max 1 per player. Response: After you discard a [[Preparation]] card you control, discard Practiced Plan → return that card to your hand from your discard pile.
